statement:
Let $X$ be a compact Hausdorff space. Let ${\mathord{\mathbf{Vec}}}(X)$
be the category of complex vector bundles over $X$. And, let
${\mathord{\mathbf{ProjMod}}}(C(X))$ be the category of finitely
generated projective modules over the $C^*$-algebra $C(X)$. There is a
functor
$\Gamma\colon {\mathord{\mathbf{Vec}}}(X) \to {\mathord{\mathbf{ProjMod}}}(C(X))$
which sends each complex vector bundle $E \to X$ to the $C(X)$-module
$\Gamma(X,E)$ of continuous sections.

The functor $\Gamma$ is an equivalence of categories.
